nodes.text: An apartment complex was sited on the planet Argul during the latter years of the Galactic Republic. In about 22 BBY, in the midst of the Battle of Argul, the Jedi Master Nemen Ull entered the complex in search of a missing Argullian child. However, the building was shelled by Confederacy of Independent Systems Armored Assault Tank, resulting in the destruction of the complex and the death of Ull.
